name: rfid-tapping-system-config
description: Centralized configuration management for RFID Tapping System

scripts.docs: echo 'Configuration documentation is available in README.md'
scripts.start:full: npm run config:dev && cd infra && docker compose up -d
scripts.start:local: npm run config:dev && concurrently "cd apps/backend && npm run dev" "cd apps/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.fresh: npm run clean:deep && npm run install:all && npm run config:dev

author: RFID System Team
